entry.title: $1800 // Huge 1 bedroom Available in prime UWS
entry.content:
HUGE 1 Bedroom Available September 1st in a 2 bedroom apartment on the UWS - PRIME LOCATION

Room -
Approx. 8 x 10 - fits a Queen size bed, Dresser & Desk

Common Area -
Oversized Living Room partially Furnished (have space for a table/bookshelf)
Bathroom standard size - Shower/Tub

Building -
Ground floor in security building
Washer & Dryer located in the basement
Live in Super
All packages (FedEx, UPS, USPS) left

Location -
Prime UWS apartment on 81st St Between Columbus and Amsterdam
Close to 81St B/C line on Central Park West and the 79th St 1 line on Broadway
Heart of amazing Restaurants, Shops, Grocery Store and Central Park

Roommate -
I am looking for a working low key clean professional, who can contribute to the apartment and can be trusted. I like to keep myself busy in the city so am not home too often but am easy going and very chilled Aussie Girl!!

Rent-
Monthly $1,800 + utilities (typically about $50/month)

Deposit -
1 month security deposit plus 1 month rent

You would be signing a new lease so would need to provide the below:
Proof of income (40 times the rent)
Recent Credit Report from Experian
Government Issued ID
Brokers fee TBD

Please contact me for more details and photos.... don't miss out on this great apartment

entry.title: $2425 // $2425 / 1br - 550ft2 with OUTDOOR TERRACE in quiet brownstone
entry.content:
2nd floor ~550 sq. ft. apartment in quiet brownstone available September 1st.

High ceilings, dark hardwood floors and exposed brick wall with working fireplace. Apartment includes private outdoor terrace/balcony overlooking leafy garden.

The building is 1.5 blocks to 1, 2, and 3 trains (2 and 3 are express.) B and C trains also nearby. Bus stops are even closer. Close to Whole Foods, Trader Joe's and all services.

Great neighborhood on leafy W 94th St. Central Park 1.5 blocks away. Rent includes heat and hot water. References checked. No pets, smoking, parking, or in-building laundry.

There is no broker fee for this apartment. There is a $35 per tenant screening fee due at time of application. Email us to get your questions answered and arrange a private showing.

No brokers, please.

entry.title: $2500 // Welcome home to this Spacious 1bed/1bath apartment for rent
entry.content: Renovated 1BR/1BA at Three Lincoln Center with East view, newer wood flooring, kitchen, master bath, W/D, new blinds. Enjoy all that Lincoln Center and the neighborhood have to offer in one of the few renovated 1 BRs to become available at Three Lincoln, recently renovated, this apartment offers a unique floor plan with generously proportioned room and beautiful high-grade 5-inch wide plank white oak hardwood floors throughout. The kitchen has been updated with wooden cabinetry and provides ample storage, including a large pantry.
